general.description: The antimatter lance directly attacks the integrity of a ship on a molecular level, rather than trying to brute force its way through the armour of enemy ships. The procedure dissipates large amounts of Birkhoff-Kerr radiation that is able to have significantly adverse effects on the ship being shot at.
general.desc_extra: Applies 7 seconds of antimatter taint upon hit, which applies a 10% speed-down to the target ship.
